mapper.select: select id as id, user_login_name as loginName, user_real_name as realName, user_nick_name as nickName, user_pwd as pwd, user_school_id as schoolId, user_phone as phone, user_mail as mail, user_qq as qq, user_weixin as weixin, user_register_time as registerTime from sau_cwnu_member where user_login_name=#{loginName}
